channel.title: Client stuck on 2%, it will not go past, help!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm having an issue with the client, its not letting me get passed 2% downloading, other computers can connect, its just me that can't. I'm running the server on my personal laptop, which is where I'm trying to load the client from. I thought it could be a local host issue, so i set up a server i have specifically for Selox, but i had the same issues, and other computers could connect.
I posted a thread on a different forum for this: http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?104610-Client-stuck-on-2-it-will-not-go-past-help!
If you can please take a look, and message me on here if you can help. I want just 1 game to play when i have down time and Runescape is that game lol.

item.title: Client stuck on 2%, it will not go past, help!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Try deleting your cache and letting the client re-download it.

Read full topic
item.source: Client stuck on 2%, it will not go past, help!

item.title: Client stuck on 2%, it will not go past, help!
item.dc:creator: @dyzaster dyzaster
item.description:
@dyzaster wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Do you mean downloading the cache or the actual client itself?

I downloaded the client and server.

I then set up the server, compiled the client, and distributed it to multiple people

Everyone can log in, except me. It gets stuck at 2%

Read full topic
